spec_data.Name: nodejs-replace
spec_data.Description:
replace is a command line utility for performing search-and-replace on files.
It's similar to sed but there are a few differences:
* Modifies files when matches are found
* Recursive search on directories with -r
* Uses JavaScript syntax for regular expressions and replacement strings.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 03:54:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command line search and replace utility using Nodejs
